'''Ema''', also known as '''Emma''',<ref>{{Ref/Book|The Byakuyakoku Collection|2}}</ref> is an open-world [[NPC]] located in [[Enkanomiya]], [[Inazuma]].

==Location==
<gallery>
NPC Location Ema.png|Ema's location
NPC Location Ema Entrance Context.png|Additional context
NPC Location Ema Context.png|Additional context
</gallery>

==Profile==
Ema is the shade of a librarian responsible for collecting any outstanding books on the last day before the people of Byakuyokoku left for the surface.

===Appearance===
Like most shades, she is a translucent humanoid figure without defining physical features.
